title: Increase the CDR on Essence Reaver to 20% to make it actually appealing for caster-based ADCs
body:
I think {{item:3508}} is an inferior item to {{item:3072}} in almost every way, being especially useless in the late-game while not bought until then. This is because mana isn't a big issue late-game, and both the lifesteal and CDR it gives are abysmal.

I suggest increasing the CDR on Essence Reaver to 20% from 10%. This will add power to the item in a unique way, making it a lot more attractive to caster-based ADCs to pick up over Bloodthirster in the late-game, which adds unique tradeoffs between them. It could even become a viable early purchase on them as well. Thoughts?
